questions.text: [FILTER]
Welcome to this survey.
questions.infoText:
With this survey, we would like to understand your personal shopping preferences and behavior, when buying makeup and skincare products.

Before answering the survey, please think of your most memorable experiences when shopping for products for your face (skin, lips, eyes) over the last 12 months.

questions.text: What were your most shopped makeup and skincare brands within the last 12 months?
Which of these would you say is your most bought makeup and skincare brand?
What is your monthly available income?
How much do you spend on makeup and skincare products per month?
Where do you typically discover and get inspired for makeup and skincare products?

answers.text: Brand online-shop, brand app, or brand homepage
Beauty and skincare retail store (e.g., Sephora store, Ulta Beauty store)
Beauty and skincare retailer online-shop, app, or homepage (e.g., Sephora.com, Ulta.com)

questions.text: Which of these do you use most to discover and get inspired for makeup and skincare products?

answers.text: Brand online-shop, brand app, or brand homepage
Beauty and skincare retail store (e.g., Sephora store, Ulta Beauty store)
Beauty and skincare retailer online-shop, app, or homepage (e.g., Sephora.com, Ulta.com)

questions.text: Where do you typically go, when looking for more detailed information about a brand, product, or beauty routine?

answers.text: Live shopping platforms (e.g., TV or online live shopping)
Brand online-shop, brand app, or brand homepage
Brand retail store (e.g., talk to beauty advisor at a store)
Department store (e.g., talk to beauty advisor at Macy’s)
Airport retail store (e.g., talk to beauty advisor)
Beauty and skincare retail store (e.g., talk to beauty advisor at Sephora store)
Beauty and skincare retailer online-shop, app, or homepage (e.g., Sephora.com, Ulta.com)

questions.text: Which of these do you use most, when looking for more detailed information about a brand, product, or a beauty routine?

answers.text: Live shopping platforms (e.g., TV or online live shopping)
Brand online-shop, brand app, or brand homepage
Brand retail store (e.g., talk to beauty advisor at a store)
Department store (e.g., talk to beauty advisor at Macy’s)
Airport retail store (e.g., talk to beauty advisor)
Beauty and skincare retail store (e.g., talk to beauty advisor at Sephora store)
Beauty and skincare retailer online-shop, app, or homepage (e.g., Sephora.com, Ulta.com)

questions.text: Where do you typically buy makeup and skincare products, if you buy them for the first time?

answers.text: Beauty and skincare retail store (e.g., Sephora)
Beauty and skincare online-shop or app (e.g., Sephora.com)
Live shopping platforms (e.g., TV or online live shopping)

questions.text: Which of these do you use most when buying makeup and skincare products, if you buy them for the first time?

answers.text: Beauty and skincare retail store (e.g., Sephora)
Beauty and skincare online-shop or app (e.g., Sephora.com)
Live shopping platforms (e.g., TV or online live shopping)

questions.text: Where do you typically buy makeup and skincare products, if you buy them again (e.g., re-stocking your favorite product)?

answers.text: Beauty and skincare retail store (e.g., Sephora)
Beauty and skincare online-shop or app (e.g., Sephora.com)
Live shopping platforms (e.g., TV or online live shopping)

questions.text: Which of these do you use most when buying makeup and skincare products, if you buy them again (e.g., re-stocking your favorite product)?

answers.text: Beauty and skincare retail store (e.g., Sephora)
Beauty and skincare online-shop or app (e.g., Sephora.com)
Live shopping platforms (e.g., TV or online live shopping)

questions.text: Are you engaging with your favorite brand in any of the following ways?

answers.text: I created a personal profile on the online-shop
I downloaded and logged into one of the brands’ apps on my smartphone
I subscribed to the email newsletter
I use the brand loyalty program
I have a subscription program (e.g., regular replenishment of products)
I regularly write online product reviews
I regularly participate in surveys (e.g., feedback, satisfaction)
I regularly participate in games or competitions (e.g., giveaways)
I follow the brand on Instagram
I follow the brand on Tiktok
I follow the brand on Facebook
I follow the brand on Snapchat
I follow the brand on Youtube
I regularly visit the brand store
I regularly visit the brand online-shop
I regularly visit a department store that offers this brand
I regularly visit a Beauty and skincare retail store that offers this brand (e.g., Sephora)
I regularly visit a Beauty and skincare online-shop that offers this brand (e.g., Sephora.com)
I regularly use services in the brand store (e.g., 15 min makeup session)
I regularly use services on the brand online-shop or app (e.g., virtual consultation, virtual try-on)
I regularly visit events in the brand store (e.g., product launch day, beauty class)
I regularly watch online events on the brand online-shop, social media, or app (e.g., live-stream shopping)
I follow the brand on Twitter
I follow the brand on Pinterest
I engage in Reddit forums on the brand

questions.text: How often do you engage with your favorite brand in any of the ways you indicated before?
Please indicate your most likely reaction on this situation: “If I don’t find my desired product in my preferred store or online-shop, I will …”

answers.text: ...look for this specific product at another place (e.g., at another store, at another online-shop)
...stay at this place and buy a different product from the same brand
...stay at this place and buy a comparable product from another brand

questions.text: Now, think of your makeup and skincare purchases in the last 12 months. The following questions focus on services that you may have experienced, or services that you would have liked to experience.
How important are the following services for your experience when informing about a product or brand, or receiving inspiration?

rows.text: When I discover an interesting product or topic on online, I can seamlessly transfer to related webpages or shops
When I am online, I can use personal devices (e.g., smart phone) to analyze my skin and learn more about it
Wherever I am, I can have a personal interaction with a beauty advisor or expert (e.g., live chat, live video)
Wherever I am, I can use mobile applications or digital devices to get answers to questions on products or beauty routines
When I am in a store or retailer, I can easily access information or inspiration, using personal devices (e.g., scan QR)

questions.text: How would you rate your experience with your favorite brand in these services?

rows.text: When I discover an interesting product or topic on online, I can seamlessly transfer to related webpages or shops
When I am online, I can use personal devices (e.g., smart phone) to analyze my skin and learn more about it
Wherever I am, I can have a personal interaction with a beauty advisor or expert (e.g., live chat, live video)
Wherever I am, I can use mobile applications or digital devices to get answers to questions on products or beauty routines
When I am in a store or retailer, I can easily access information or inspiration, using personal devices (e.g., scan QR)

questions.text: How important are the following personalization services for your experience when informing about a product or brand, or receiving inspiration?

rows.text: Wherever I interact with a brand, I see information or inspiration, relating to me, my interests and shopping preferences.
Wherever I interact with a brand, I am shown information that considers my actual context (e.g., location, state of mind)
When I receive messages from a brand, I am shown information or inspiration that relates to my actual shopping behavior
Wherever I interact with a brand, I have effortless access to information about my shopping behavior and preferences.
Wherever I shop, past purchases and preferences are considered for services (e.g., tailored advice)
When I shop online or offline, services (e.g., recommendations) consider my social media activity (e.g., likes, comments)

questions.text: How would you rate your experience with your favorite brand in these services?

rows.text: Wherever I interact with a brand, I see information or inspiration, relating to me, my interests and shopping preferences.
Wherever I interact with a brand, I am shown information that considers my actual context (e.g., location, state of mind)
When I receive messages from a brand, I am shown information or inspiration that relates to my actual shopping behavior
Wherever I interact with a brand, I have effortless access to information about my shopping behavior and preferences.
Wherever I shop, past purchases and preferences are considered for services (e.g., tailored advice)
When I shop online or offline, services (e.g., recommendations) consider my social media activity (e.g., likes, comments)

questions.text: How important are the following services for your convenience when buying the product?

rows.text: Wherever I shop, I can log into a personal profile that recognizes my preferences and latest activities
If I am in a store and a product is not in stock, I can order it from there for delivery to my home or elsewhere
If I am online and a product is not in stock, I can order it from another retailer
If I am online, I can see which beauty products are in stock at shops or retailers
I can reserve or buy a beauty product online and can pick it up in store or on the curbside effortlessly
I can reserve or buy a beauty product online and pick up or return it 24/7, also outside of opening hours
Regardless of where I bought a product, I can effortlessly return it wherever I want
I can order products online and have them arrive at my home on the next day

questions.text: How would you rate your experience with your favorite brand in these services?

rows.text: Wherever I shop, I can log into a personal profile that recognizes my preferences and latest activities
If I am in a store and a product is not in stock, I can order it from there for delivery to my home or elsewhere
If I am online and a product is not in stock, I can order it from another retailer
If I am online, I can see which beauty products are in stock at shops or retailers

Regardless of where I bought a product, I can effortlessly return it wherever I want
I can order products online and have them arrive at my home on the next day

questions.text: How important are the following services for your convenience when buying the product?

rows.text: I can order products online and have them arrive at my home on the same day
I can order products online and have them arrive at my home in the next few hours
I can re-route online orders to fit my needs (e.g., from home to store, from home to pickup, from store to home)
At wherever retailer I shop, I am rewarded for brand loyalty (e.g., collect loyalty points and get personal discounts)
I receive promotional offers that are relevant to me, my shopping behavior and preferences (e.g., personalized coupons)
Wherever I buy a product, I can test it before in store, or via a sample sent to my home, or via a virtual feature in app
My smartphone app assists me in navigating effortlessly to and within all stores and retailers
I can use my personal device for making payments when shopping in store (e.g., via the brand mobile app)
I can simply grab products and leave a store, because payment is done automatically with the help of smart technology
Wherever I bought a product, a personal assistant takes care of my experience and satisfaction (e.g., calls a week later)
Wherever I bought a product, I can express my satisfaction and address needs via mobile applications or digital devices

questions.text: How would you rate your experience with your favorite brand in these services?

rows.text: I can order products online and have them arrive at my home on the same day

questions.text: How important are the following services for interacting in a brand-related community before and after purchases?

rows.text: I can engage with my favorite brand in a 3D-virtual-world (e.g., virtual store) with direct links to the physical world
I can receive a unique virtual asset that has benefits in the physical world (e.g., NFT ownership over digital artwork)
I can directly interact with my friends in the online-shop to share wish list, share styles, have live chat etc.
I can engage in an online beauty community to share styles, see what’s trending, engage in comments and discussions etc.
I can engage in an online beauty community and receive loyalty points for my engagements (e.g., product reviews)

questions.text: How would you rate your experience with your favorite brand in these services?

rows.text: I can engage with my favorite brand in a 3D-virtual-world (e.g., virtual store) with direct links to the physical world
I can receive a unique virtual asset that has benefits in the physical world (e.g., NFT ownership over digital artwork)
I can directly interact with my friends in the online-shop to share wish list, share styles, have live chat etc.
I can engage in an online beauty community to share styles, see what’s trending, engage in comments and discussions etc.
I can engage in an online beauty community and receive loyalty points for my engagements (e.g., product reviews)

questions.text: Further, is there any other experience or service that would help you a lot when buying beauty and personal care products (e.g., inspiration, convenience, wow-effect)?
